prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

lha shag dang | rgyan gyi dgongs pa rigs gter las |
mi slu ma shes don gsal 2 ||
rnam grangs pa'ang phye ste smra || zhes gsung shing | de dgag pa yang |
mtshan nyid 2 kyis 'jog na ni ||
mtshon byed de yang 2 su 'gyur ||
mtshon bya gnyis su 'dod na yang ||
spyi mtshan 1 pa mi srid 'gyur ||
tha snyad pa dang don dam pa ||
2 ga la yang 2 po 'jug || Different from VIII 42ab against Chos mchog, which reads: ma khyab gcod tshul 'dir mi 'thad || gnyis su 'byed pa dgongs pa min ces dang | bram ze'i bzhed pa la yang |
mi dgos ma khyab mi srid 3 ||
bden pa'i don rtogs 'dod na yod || ces so ||

mi slu ba'i don ni | rigs gter las |
gang gis gang la ji ltar mi slu
zhes pa 3 bshad cing | don bsdu na | don ji ltar gnas pa ltar yod pa la yod par shes med pa la med par shes pa'o ||

chos rjes ¦
tshad ma'i stobs kyis nges pa 'dren ||
nges pa'i 'gal zla sgro 'dogs yin || zhes bya ba ltar | kun du tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'jug ldog byed pa na nges shes 'dren dgos te
yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min ||
phyir na tshad ma nyid mi 'gyur || (PV I.200ab) zhes bya bas so || =RTRG ad RT VIII.46ab de ltar tshad ma'i grangs pa'i nges shes des
sgro 'dogs gcod pa yin te |
nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs yid ||
gnod bya gnod byed ngo bo'i phyir ||
'di ni sgro 'dogs dben pa la ||
'jug ces bya bar shes pa yin || zhes bya bas so || des na mngon sum gyis sgro 'dogs gcod ces brjod kyang mngon sum min gyi, rjes kyi nges pa gcod pa yin te, ku sha lag pas bzung nas zor bas gcod pa bzhin no || =RTRG ad VIII.49ab
'di dag gi don nges par bya ba la gcad bya sgro 'dogs kyi rang bzhin ¦ gcod byed nges pa'i rang bzhin ni: des ji ltar sgro 'dogs gcod pa'i tshul 3 gyis nges par byed par gsung kyang, rtogs sla zhing | 'og nas rtog pa'i rab dbye'i skabs su yang 'chad pas na 'dir ma spros so ||

chos rje pas (tshid) (bcadu) bsdebs pa ni ¦
don rig 2 dang rang rig dang ||
rjes su dpag pa rang las nges ||
dang po pa dang yid ma gtad ||
'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan las nges || zhes gsungs shing | de nges byed kyi tshad ma yang |
don byed pa dang goms pa
can ||
rjes su dpag pas nges par byed || ces bya'o

rigs pas sun phyin gyi mkhas pa chen po cha pa swo for "la sogs pa" kyis kyang dpyod pa ba'i phyogs su
bslan nas dgag pa mdzad pa yin no ||

gangs can mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan chos rjes paNDi ta chen pos kyang snang yul dang gzung yul 1 du mdzad nas dgag pa mdzad pa'i rgyu mtshan yang de 'di
yin no |

chos
kyi rjes mngon ng po mdo'i lung | byeg pa 3 rnam rig nyis | zhes pa ltar legs par mngon yang ba mi bla mas ni bang ni skad pa dang don pi rnam bzhagnyis las dang po'i dbang du byas nas rigs gter nyid las kyang bag chag brtan dang mi brtan las | bden dang sdun pi rnaM bzhag byed | cesungs pas mngon dang po 2 kyang
bzhed la phyi ma'i dpang du byas nas seMs tsam gyi tshul la rnor mngon dang dang rim mngon 3 ngo na yin pas byeg pa 3 rnam rig nyis | zhesungs pa yino |

rigs gter gyi dongs pa yid mngon yin na 'das pa yin pas khyab cing 'das pa las 'das pa li skye ba'i phyir na yid mngon la rgyun med ces 'dod pa'i
khyor su bshad nas dgag pa yin du mang pa mdzad pa ni lung de la skyon rjod pa dbyes pa tsam du zad kyi yung de la ni chunga kyang mi bgod |

chos rjegi tshad 'bras ni la me'i tshogs don
gzhalya du ba'i tang las de rtog pi rjegi tha skad 'brus | du ba'i rtag las la mo'i don tshang gyi rnal pa shar nas de la gsang du mu ni shes pa tshad ma zhes yang na phyil gyi don bzhalya don gyi rnaM pa shar nas don la bsar du mu bi shes pa tshad pa don rtog tshad ma 'brus | zhes pa des ba na rigi rjeg
pang mtshan nus gsung |

chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa'i zhal
mnga' nas kyang | de ltar grub mtha' 4 las slob dpon ni phyi rol gyi don khas len pa'i tshe mdo sde pa ltar mdzad la | shes bya nang la 'jug pa na rnam med zhal gyis bzhes so | zhes gsung ngo | ci ste 'dir yang | gang gis dngos po rnam dpyad na || zhes 1 dang du bral gyi gtan tshigs gsung pa min nam zhe na | gsung mod kyi | des ni dngos po mtha' dag rang bzhin med par
gtan la 'bebs pa ma yin no ||
pa sgrib par gyur pa tsam zhig du zod des na chos rje thaMd mkhyen pas sa gsungs ltar | blo das 1 gis gang rung 1 rtong na 1 shos kyang rtogs pas khyab pa ni ldig dmigs kyi don to |

dmyings pa yin pir | snang bas sreg chang gi gi rgya mthong ba'i gags sbyed yir | dper na snang 1 mtshan rgyu dang || de las bdan pa'i dbangos dan | zugs mthong ba dang yi thun dang || 'thun pa tar byed pa 4n | zheso zhes lan 'debs kyang | chos rje sgrib pa med pa'i spyan dang ldan pas | zugs dang snang ba ni
rugs dmigs pa snang pa la logs pa'i srob chang la las dmigs pa na rdzas tha dad ma yin | lcags bsreg pa 4n | snang ba la mos pa byi ba log pa la ldig dmigs med | snang ba med kyang zugs dang | rgyas med kyang snang ba dmigs pir | lags dang me tha dad par dmigs pa 4n | zhesung ngos ngos byun pi rnaM bzhan dang
rdzas 1 dang rdzas tha dad ni sngar dpyad pa las shes |

rjes pa dpag byas pa yod ces brjod pa la brtens kyang cho rjes su pag bya kha na la mi po ste chos rjes dud pa ba dang shad don rjes su pa bya lang po pir rjes su pa bya'i sa byang b kyi zhe na dang rjes su dang bya la yod ces brjod pa la bsten pa nyes pa dpa' bo de chon kho na la gog pa yin gyi
sgras byag mo ba'i rgyun gnas skabs kyi nges pa yod pir phyogs kyi 'brel pa gtan la 'babs pa'i gnas skabsu phogs kyi sgro de bsgrub ba'i chon kho na la 'jug pir |

'jug pa la lab pa bskyor ci dogs snyam na | dngos ming de ltar rjod na lrub pa ci yang med mod kyi don kyang shed chon gyi chos rjes 'gro ldog pa zhes tshul 3 brjod pa yige mnyaM pas rjer mi bde ba dang | phyogs 'thong pod medang || zhes bya ba lasog pa'i tshog le'ur byas pa mi 'grib pas mkhas
pa rnams kyis bad pa mtshad yang star kyi de 'jug thos pa bzhugs kyi don go na stod pang nas pa yon pa yang ba'i yang hyir zhes dang gyi thin pa la zhus kyis den togs pang nyes pa brgyad pa ma yin mnyam pas bsgus kyang pa yong du spangs pa yino | des na kyi skyed ni rtog kyang ba pa dang nas
…gtan tshigs thigs pa las : * kyis don go yang nye bar b* pa * yi ge mnyam pas bsgrub dka' ba yongs su spangs pa yin no |
